HomePage.title: Ultra-Wide Band e-ID Vaildation System
HomePage.extra-security-1: Your elD is stored on the Secure Element of your phone.
HomePage.extra-security-2: Ultra-Wide Band technology is used to establish a real-time ranging with tamper-resistant protection.
HomePage.extra-security-3: The "Lost Mode" on your phone immediately protects your identity.
HomePage.low-cost-1: The anchor automatically connects to your device.
HomePage.low-cost-1-1: Approach it to free your hands
HomePage.low-cost-2: Administrator can distribute and manage the access control. Also reduce the cost of maintenance as e-ID is stored on your phone.
HomePage.use-case-1-1: Access control at different types of properties. You can share a one-time pass with your guest
HomePage.use-case-2-1: Integrated into self-service kiosk. You can now truly focus on your work
HomePage.use-case-4-1: Parking entrance and exit. No more annoying stopping.
